actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-248, by Mr. Sessions.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1074 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Shall be in order to consider as an original bill the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Government Reform now printed in the bill. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments. Provides for consideration of only those amendments pre-printed in the Congressional Record.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 92.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 258.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1074) to provide Government-wide accounting of regulatory costs and benefits, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 1074 (Government-wide accounting of regulatory costs and benefits).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1074) to provide Government-wide accounting of regulatory costs and benefits, and for other purposes.
